import React from 'react' import content from '../content'; function ContactInfo() { return (

Kontakt

Send meg ein melding så kan me snakka.

Fyll in formen så tar eg kontakt så fort eg kan.

{content.contact.phone}

{content.contact.email}

{content.contact.address}

) } export default ContactInfo
